subject: Suits and Litigation
Sports Injuries
Organized Labor
Collective Bargaining
Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. players union filed a lawsuit Thursday on behalf of the players suspended in the New Orleans Saints bounty case claiming that Roger Goodell was “incurably and evidently biased.”
snippet: The N.F.L. players union filed a lawsuit Thursday on behalf of the players suspended in the New Orleans Saints bounty case claiming that Roger Goodell was “incurably and evidently biased.”
